description: Try our easy to follow Blueberry Bliss Balls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bliss & protein ball,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Blueberry,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Back to school,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Jan Feb 2020,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Blueberry Bliss Balls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place Medjool dates, coconut, quinoa flakes, chia seeds, blueberries and maple syrup in a food processor and process until it forms a smooth paste.
Transfer to a bowl and chill for 30 minutes. Roll into balls. Store in freezer for up to 3 months.
